item.lanterns.broadsides-lantern.lantern: Drop a bomb from above that explodes after {{bombTime}} second.  Deals {{damage}} damage and can interrupt Behemoths.
item.lanterns.broadsides-lantern.name: Broadsides Lantern
item.lanterns.drasks-eye.lantern_ability: Fires a lightning bolt in a direction that deals {{shockDamage}} Shock damage multiple times as it passes through enemies.
item.lanterns.drasks-eye.name: Drask's Eye
item.lanterns.embermanes-rapture.lantern: Create a fire ball in front of you that explodes after {{fireBallTime}} seconds, dealing {{blazeDamage}} Blaze damage to all nearby enemies.
item.lanterns.embermanes-rapture.name: Embermane's Rapture
item.lanterns.koshais-bloom.lantern_abil: Dash in a direction, deal {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies upon arrival, and gain {{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal for {{lifestealTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.koshais-bloom.name: Koshai's Bloom
item.lanterns.pangars-shine.lantern_abil: Create a frost pillar in front of you that deals {{frostDamage}} Frost damage to nearby enemies over {{damageTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.pangars-shine.name: Pangar's Shine
item.lanterns.recruits-lantern.lantern_a: Grants a {{shield}} hit point shield that lasts {{shieldTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.recruits-lantern.name: Recruit's Lantern
item.lanterns.shrikes-zeal.lantern_abili: Creates an aura that grants nearby Slayers {{percentIncreasedMovementAndAttackSpeed}}% increased move speed and attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.shrikes-zeal.name: Shrike's Zeal
item.lanterns.skarns-defiance.lantern_ab: Surrounds the slayer in swirling stone that deals {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies for {{damageTime}} seconds. Also generates {{shield}} hit point shields per second that expire after {{shieldTime}} seconds. (Max {{maxShield}} shields)
item.lanterns.skarns-defiance.name: Skarn's Defiance
item.omnicells.artificer.active: Command: Your drone acts based on the target.{{NL}} 1. Slayer: Remove negative status effects and grant Artificer Aura for {{statusRemovalTime}}s.{{NL}} 2. Ground: Create a wall that blocks hostile projectiles and grants Artificer Aura to nearby Slayers for {{wallTime}}s.{{NL}} 3. Behemoth: Make a part to take +{{percentDamage}}% damage for {{damageTime}}s.{{NL}} 4. Downed Slayer: Revive and grant Artificer Aura for {{reviveAuraTime}}s (once every {{reviveCooldown}}s).{{NL}} Artificer Aura: Restore {{auraHeal}} health/second. At full health, grants {{auraShield}} Shields/second that last for {{shieldTime}}s (maximum {{maxShields}} Shields){{NL}} Cooldown: {{cooldown}}s
item.omnicells.artificer.name: Artificer
item.omnicells.artificer.passive: Amount of healing and shielding granted per second is increased by {{healingAndShielding}} for every {{currentHealth}} current health when activated.
item.omnicells.bastion.active: Leap forward and slam the ground consuming all shields in a blast of energy that deals damage to nearby targets equal to {{percentShieldDamage}}% the amount of shields consumed. {{damageCooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.bastion.name: Bastion
item.omnicells.bastion.passive: Increase all shields received by {{percentShieldIncrease}}%. Dealing damage has a chance to grant a stacking, refreshing {{shield}} health shield that lasts for {{shieldTime}} seconds (max {{maxShields}} shields).
item.omnicells.discipline.active: Perform a quick parrying punch that deals {{blazeDamage}} blaze damage. Parrying an attack does +{{percentParryDamage}}% damage and grants a stack of Flaming Fist,  giving +{{percentCritDamage}}% critical strike damage. This can stack {{stacks}} times.  {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.discipline.name: Discipline
item.omnicells.discipline.passive: Critical strike chance and damage increased by {{percentCritChanceAndCritDamage}}%. Healing is reduced by {{percentHealingReduction}}%. Reaching max stacks of Flaming Fist makes you Disciplined, increasing your critical strike chance by {{percentCritChance}}% for {{critChanceTime}} seconds  but increased damage received by {{percentDamageReceived}}%. When Disciplined ends, stacks are cleared.
item.omnicells.iceborne.active: Throw an ice lance that does {{frostDamage}} frost damage, double damage if thrown at full health. Also prevents you from being staggered and grants +{{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal  for {{lifestealTime}} seconds. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.iceborne.name: Iceborne
item.omnicells.iceborne.passive: Increase max health by {{maxHealth}}. Gain {{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal and {{percentDamageReduction}}% reduced damage, then again for every {{missingHealth}} missing health. Taking damage reduces cooldown of the Active Ability by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds (only once every {{cooldown}} seconds).
item.omnicells.revenant.active: Drain up to {{healthDrain}} health to enter Revenant state and spawn a Void Orb. For every {{drainedHealth}} health drained, summon an Umbral Tendril that deals {{umbralDamage}} umbral damage. If an Umbral Tendril hits a target, it spawns an additional Void Orb upon impact. Picking up a Void Orb grants a stack of Void Energy,  which gives +{{percentDamage}}% damage and extends Revenant state by {{revenantDurationExtend}}  second. Revenant state lasts for {{revenantTime}} seconds and prevents all healing.
item.omnicells.revenant.name: Revenant
item.omnicells.revenant.passive: Lifesteal +{{percentLifesteal}}%. When Revenant state ends, each stack of Void Energy grants {{health}} health per second for {{healthTime}} seconds.
item.omnicells.tempest.active: Consume a stack of Velocity to dash ahead and deal {{shockDamage}} shock damage to a nearby target, prioritizing unbroken behemoth parts. For every {{percentMovementIncreaseThreshold}}% increase in movement speed, deal +{{percentDamageToUnbrokenPart}}% damage to unbroken parts. Stacks are refreshed on use. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.tempest.name: Tempest
item.omnicells.tempest.passive: Attack speed +{{percentAttackSpeed}}%. Dodging through an attack grants a stack of Velocity. Each stack lasts {{stackTime}} seconds and increases movement speed by {{percentMovespeed}}%
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.cyclonic-: Tempest Form duration increased by {{timeIncreased}} seconds. When Tempest Form has less than {{timeLess}} seconds remaining, deal +{{damage}}% damage.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.echo-brac: Critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Karma Breaker's damage over time by {{damage}}% until the debuff ends or is refreshed.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.inertial-: Surge deals +{{damage}}% damage. After surging, gain +{{speed}}% movespeed for {{speedTime}} seconds. Stacks up to {{speedStack}} times.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.specials.adama: Unleash energy in a focused blast, dealing {{damageBlast}} damage to the first enemy hit. Deals up to +{{damage}}% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.specials.titan: Unleash energy forward in a pressure wave, dealing {{damageWave}} damage to the closest target and {{damageNearbyTarget}} damage to nearby target. Deals up to +{{damage}}% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
item.parts.axe.mods.furious-axecore.name: Furious Axecore
item.parts.axe.mods.furious-axecore.part: Perfectly charged attacks grants +{{meter}} meter on hit, but no longer grant resolve.
item.parts.axe.mods.lightweight-haft.par: Movespeed while charging Horizontal Attacks is now increased instead of decreased and costs no stamina to maintain.
item.parts.axe.mods.overcharged-cylinder: Determination can now stack up to {{times}} times.
item.parts.axe.mods.railsplitters-cantee: Tonics consumed while your axe is thrown have +{{effect}}% effectiveness.
item.parts.axe.mods.volatile-axecore.par: Charging attack deals aoe damage to nearby enemies at each charge level.
item.parts.axe.specials.flight-of-ruin.p: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies while thrown. Reactivate to call the axe and perform a powerful overhand swing that can generate determination.
item.parts.axe.specials.grim-onslaught.p: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path before landing a distance away. Hitting a Behemoth can generate Resolve and will bounce the axe back towards the user.
item.parts.axe.specials.relentless-onsla: Hurl the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path. Catch the axe to throw it again up to {{axeThrow}} more times in the next {{axeThrowTime}} seconds, dealing {{axeDamage1}}/{{axeDamage2}}/{{axeDamage3}} damage (further increased by determination). Does not build meter.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.demolition-b: Deal +{{damage}}% damage to minions, fauna and objects created by Behemoths. On killing a minion, fauna, or object, gain {{momentum}} momentum.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.hurricane-bl: Using Blade Spin grants stacking on-next hit damage that is consumed when using other attacks.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.lightweight-: Increase the length of your chains by +{{lengthBonus}}%. Your Chain Pull deals +{{damage}}% damage and generates an additional {{meter}} meter.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.momentum-bla: After using a special, your next special use within {{time}} seconds is free.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.serrated-bla: Bladed attacks have a chance to cause your next {{attacks}} lacerating attacks to deal +{{damage}}% wound damage.
item.parts.chainblades.specials.cruel-ri: Teleport forward with invulnerability and strike the nearest Behemoth part, dealing {{damage}} damage and applying a mark that deals {{damageMark}} damage per second for {{damageMarkTime}} seconds. When a mark expires, it deals {{damageMarkExpires}} damage for each other mark active at the time. Mark duration increased to {{timeMarkIncreased}} seconds if an attack is avoided during the teleport.
item.parts.chainblades.specials.insatiab: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a followup. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum to heal you and create a {{heal}} healing orb for each momentum consumed. Targets at or healed to full health gain {{damage}}% damage for {{damageTime}} seconds, stacking up to {{damageStack}} times. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed.)
item.parts.chainblades.specials.reapers-: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a follow up. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum and deals greatly increased damage per momentum consumed. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed)
item.parts.hammer.mods.antique-clip.name: Antique Clip
item.parts.hammer.mods.antique-clip.part: Ammo decreased to {{ammoDecrease}}, but bonus from aethercharged ammo is increased by {{percentDamage}}%.
item.parts.hammer.mods.impulse-crown.par: Aerial Strike grants increased damage dealt for {{damageTime}} seconds. Bonus is doubled if a Behemoth's head is struck.
item.parts.hammer.mods.turbine-trigger.p: Priming attacks increases attack speed by {{percentAttackSpeed}}% until the combo ends. Stacks.
item.parts.hammer.mods.weighted-crown.pa: Stagger damage is no longer halved when attacking Behemoth legs.
item.parts.hammer.specials.concussive-sa: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, damage and interrupting behemoths.
item.parts.hammer.specials.ironheart-lan: Hold to load ammo into the hammer. Release to create an aether vent that buffs players who step over it, granting them +{{percentDamageReduction}}% damage reduction and up to {{healing}} healing over {{healingTime}} seconds when aethercharged.
item.parts.hammer.specials.mighty-landbr: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, creating an aether vent that buffs players.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.full-bore-c: Fires a piercing bolt in a line, dealing damage that falls as it travels.
Empowered: Deals greatly increased damage and pushes the slayer backwards.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.marksman-ch: Fires a shot in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage to the first Behemoth hit. If a part is struck, that part takes {{percentDamage}}% more damage from Shots for {{damageTime}} seconds.
Empowered: Damage bonus increased to {{empoweredPercentDamage}}%, and {{empoweredPercentAllyDamage}}% to all allies.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.salvo-chamb: Fires an explosive missile in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage in an area upon impact.
Empowered: Fires {{missiles}} missiles in a spread.
Launches a collectible buff a short distance, granting {{percentAttackSpeed}}% increased attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds when collected.
Empowered: Grants the same buff to all Slayers.
